title: Paris/15th arrondissement
name: le Quinzième
content: The restaurant, lies alongside Parc André Citroën. By 2005, wide audiences were following Cyril Lignac on TV as he opened his own restaurant, Le Quinzième, on the popular French series “Oui Chef!” Here he brilliantly demonstrated his know-how and good taste, producing refined and slightly off-beat cooking, always made with his trademark top quality ingredients.
